short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will let you replace all text in a website with Hodor. Why? Why not! Created by Shai Lachmanovich.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you often feel that content in websites tends to be... meaningless?
If it's meaningless anyway, why not read it like Hodor would?

Go to any website*, and once it fully loaded, click the "H" icon in the corner of you browser, and see for yourself what would Hodor see...

* Currently supports Latin, Cyrillic, Hebrew and Arabic characters.
